admin_templates.template:
<xen:set var="$columnsOptions"> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_group_column_width}:" name="{$namePrefix}column_width" explain="{xen:phrase wf_group_column_width_explain}" value="{$options.column_width}" min="0" step="50"/> </xen:set>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_group_layout}:" name="{$namePrefix}layout" value="{xen:if 'isset({$options.layout})', {$options.layout}, 'rows'}"> <xen:option value="rows" label="{xen:phrase wf_group_layout_rows}"> </xen:option>
<xen:option value="columns" label="{xen:phrase wf_group_layout_columns}" inputclass="Hider"> <xen:disabled>{xen:raw $columnsOptions}</xen:disabled> </xen:option>
<xen:option value="tabs" label="{xen:phrase wf_group_layout_tabs}"> </xen:option>
<xen:option value="random" label="{xen:phrase wf_group_layout_random}"> </xen:option> </xen:radiounit>

{xen:phrase wf_confirm_removal_of_widget}: {$widget.rendererName} {xen:phrase wf_confirm_removal_of_widget} {$widget.rendererName}

{xen:phrase wf_please_confirm_that_you_want_to_delete_following_widget}:

{$widget.rendererName} #{$widget.widget_id} ({$widget.position})

{xen:if '{$widget.class} === "WidgetFramework_WidgetGroup"', 1} {xen:if '{$widget.widget_id}', {xen:if '{$widgetIsGroup}', {xen:phrase wf_edit_group}, {xen:phrase wf_edit_widget}}, {xen:phrase wf_add_widget}} {$widgetPage.title} - {xen:raw $title} {xen:raw $title} {$widgetPage.title} {xen:raw $title} {xen:phrase wf_title_explain} {xen:phrase wf_title_translations}: {$phrase.language_title} = "{$phrase.phrase_text}" N/A {xen:raw $textboxTitleExplain} Do not allow changing renderer type for groups {xen:if '{$_layoutEditor}', '', {xen:phrase wf_renderer_explain}}
{xen:phrase wf_position_explain} {xen:phrase wf_display_order_explain} {xen:phrase wf_expression_explain} {xen:if '{$_layoutEditor}', '', {xen:phrase wf_conditional_explain, 'link={xen:link misc/wf-layout-editor, '', 'redirect={xen:link canonical:index}'}' }} {xen:raw $conditionalParamsExplain} {xen:phrase wf_widget_is_active} {xen:phrase wf_deactivate_for_mobile}
{xen:helper striphtml, $group._runtime.title} #{$siblingWidget.widget_id} - {xen:helper striphtml, $siblingWidget._runtime.title}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase wf_import_widgets}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/import'}" upload="true">
<xen:uploadunit label="{xen:phrase wf_import_from_uploaded_file}:" name="upload_file" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_import_from_file_on_server}:" name="server_file" />
<xen:if is="{$widgetPages}"> <xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase wf_widget_page}:" name="widget_page_id"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_import_into_widget_page_explain}</xen:explain> <xen:option value="0"></xen:option> <xen:foreach loop="$widgetPages" value="$widgetPage"> <xen:option value="{$widgetPage.node_id}">{$widgetPage.title}</xen:option> </xen:foreach> </xen:selectunit> </xen:if>
<xen:checkboxunit label="" explain="{xen:phrase wf_delete_all_before_import_explain}"> <xen:option name="delete_all" value="1">{xen:phrase wf_delete_all_before_import}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase wf_import_widgets}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase wf_widgets} {xen:phrase wf_export_widgets} + {xen:phrase wf_add_widget}

{xen:phrase wf_widgets}

  • {$position.position}

{xen:phrase showing_x_of_y_items, 'count={xen:count $widgets}', 'total={xen:count $widgets}'}

<xen:if is="!isset({$canToggle})"> <xen:set var="$canToggle">{xen:helper WidgetFramework_canToggle, $widget}</xen:set> </xen:if> <xen:set var="$href">{xen:adminlink 'widgets/edit', $widget}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$delete">{xen:adminlink 'widgets/delete', $widget}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$label">{xen:helper striphtml, $widget._runtime.title}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$labelClass">{xen:if '!{$widget.active}', 'disabled'}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$snippet">{$widget.rendererName} ({xen:number $widget.display_order})</xen:set>
<xen:if is="{$canToggle}"> <xen:listitem id="{$widget.widget_id}" href="{xen:raw $href}" delete="{xen:raw $delete}" label="{xen:raw $label}" labelclass="{xen:raw $labelClass}" snippet="{xen:raw $snippet}" toggle="{$widget.active}" toggletitle="{xen:phrase enable_disable_x, 'title={xen:helper striphtml, $widget._runtime.title}'}">> <xen:popup title="{xen:phrase controls}" ctrlclass="toolsCtrl"> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/disable', $widget, '_xfToken={$visitor.csrf_token_page}'}" displayif="{$widget.active}">{xen:phrase disable}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/enable', $widget, '_xfToken={$visitor.csrf_token_page}'}" displayif="!{$widget.active} AND !{$widget.rendererNotFound}">{xen:phrase enable}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/delete', $widget}">{xen:phrase delete}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/edit', $widget}">{xen:phrase edit}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/duplicate', $widget}">{xen:phrase wf_duplicate}</xen:link> </xen:popup> </xen:listitem> <xen:else /> <xen:listitem id="{$widget.widget_id}" href="{xen:raw $href}" delete="{xen:raw $delete}" label="{xen:raw $label}" labelclass="{xen:raw $labelClass}" snippet="{xen:raw $snippet}"> <xen:popup title="{xen:phrase controls}" ctrlclass="toolsCtrl"> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/disable', $widget, '_xfToken={$visitor.csrf_token_page}'}" displayif="{$widget.active}">{xen:phrase disable}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/enable', $widget, '_xfToken={$visitor.csrf_token_page}'}" displayif="!{$widget.active} AND !{$widget.rendererNotFound}">{xen:phrase enable}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/delete', $widget}">{xen:phrase delete}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/edit', $widget}">{xen:phrase edit}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'widgets/duplicate', $widget}">{xen:phrase wf_duplicate}</xen:link> </xen:popup> </xen:listitem> </xen:if>
• {xen:helper striphtml, $widget._runtime.title} layout={$widget.options.layout} ({xen:number $widget.display_order})

<input type="hidden" name="options_loaded" value="{$options_loaded}" />
<xen:if hascontent="true"> <fieldset> <xen:contentcheck> {xen:raw {$optionsRendered}} </xen:contentcheck> </fieldset> </xen:if>
<xen:if is="{$options_loaded}"> <xen:if is="{$rendererConfiguration.useCache}"> <xen:textboxunit name="{$namePrefix}cache_seconds" label="{xen:phrase wf_cache_seconds}" value="{$options.cache_seconds}" placeholder="{$rendererConfiguration.cacheSeconds}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_cache_seconds_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit> </xen:if> <xen:else /> <xen:foreach loop="{$widget.options}" key="$optionKey" value="$optionValue"> <xen:if is="!is_array({$optionValue})"> <input type="hidden" name="{$namePrefix}{$optionKey}" value="{$optionValue}" /> </xen:if> </xen:foreach> </xen:if>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{$options.limit}"> <xen:explain> {xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_users_lowercase}"} {xen:phrase wf_limit_zero_explain} </xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_birthday_avatar_only}:" name="{$namePrefix}avatar_only"> <xen:option value="1" selected="{$options.avatar_only}">{xen:phrase yes}</xen:option> <xen:option value="0" selected="!{$options.avatar_only}">{xen:phrase no}</xen:option> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_birthday_avatar_only_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:checkboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_whitelist_user_groups}:" name="{$namePrefix}whitelist_user_groups" class="checkboxColumns" explain="{xen:phrase wf_whitelist_user_groups_explain}"> <xen:options source="$whitelistUserGroups" /> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_blacklist_user_groups}:" name="{$namePrefix}blacklist_user_groups" class="checkboxColumns" explain="{xen:phrase wf_blacklist_user_groups_explain}"> <xen:options source="$blacklistUserGroups" /> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:controlunit label="{xen:phrase php_callback}:" explain="{xen:phrase wf_widget_callback_callback_explain}"> <xen:textbox placeholder="{xen:phrase class}" name="{$namePrefix}callback_class" value="{$options.callback_class}" size="25" /> :: <xen:textbox placeholder="{xen:phrase method}" name="{$namePrefix}callback_method" value="{$options.callback_method}" size="25" /> </xen:controlunit>

<xen:checkboxunit label="" value=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}noVisitorPanel" value="1" selected="{$options.noVisitorPanel}">{xen:phrase wf_widget_empty_hide_visitor_panel}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase url}:" name="{$namePrefix}url" value="{$options.url}" />
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_feed_entry}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_display_mode}:" name="{$namePrefix}displayMode" value="{xen:if '{$options.displayMode}', $options.displayMode, 'plusImage'}"> <xen:option value="titleOnly">{xen:phrase wf_widget_feed_reader_display_mode_title_only}</xen:option> <xen:option value="withContent">{xen:phrase wf_widget_feed_reader_display_mode_with_content}</xen:option> <xen:option value="plusImage">{xen:phrase wf_widget_feed_reader_display_mode_plus_image}</xen:option> </xen:radiounit>

<input type="hidden" name="{$namePrefix}hide_following" value="1" />
<xen:checkboxunit label="" value=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}hide_following" value="0" selected="!{$options.hide_following}">{xen:phrase wf_widget_online_users_following}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_poll_thread_id}:" name="{$namePrefix}thread_id" value="{$options.thread_id}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_poll_thread_id_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_popular_cutoff}:" name="{$namePrefix}cutoff" value="{xen:if 'isset({$options.cutoff})', $options.cutoff, 7}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_widget_poll_cutoff_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase wf_threads_forums}:" name="{$namePrefix}forums" value="" size="5" multiple="true" inputclass="textCtrl"> <xen:options source="$forums" /> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_threads_forums_explain} {xen:phrase wf_special_forums_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase wf_threads_sticky_threads_only}" name="{$namePrefix}sticky" value="{$options.sticky}" inputclass="textCtrl"> <xen:option value=""></xen:option> <xen:option value="1">{xen:phrase yes}</xen:option> <xen:option value="0">{xen:phrase no}</xen:option> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}open_only" value="1" selected="{$options.open_only}">{xen:phrase wf_thread_open_only}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase profile_posts}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_recent_status_show_update_form}:" name="{$namePrefix}show_update_form"> <xen:option value="1" selected="{$options.show_update_form}">{xen:phrase yes}</xen:option> <xen:option value="0" selected="!{$options.show_update_form}">{xen:phrase no}</xen:option> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_recent_status_show_update_form_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:radiounit>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_profile_posts}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_status_cutoff}:" name="{$namePrefix}cutoff" value="{xen:if 'isset({$options.cutoff})', {$options.cutoff}, 7}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_status_cutoff_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_recent_status_friends_only}:" name="{$namePrefix}friends_only"> <xen:option value="1" selected="{$options.friends_only}">{xen:phrase yes}</xen:option> <xen:option value="0" selected="!{$options.friends_only}">{xen:phrase no}</xen:option> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_recent_status_friends_only_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_recent_status_show_duplicates}:" name="{$namePrefix}show_duplicates"> <xen:option value="1" selected="{$options.show_duplicates}">{xen:phrase yes}</xen:option> <xen:option value="0" selected="!{$options.show_duplicates}">{xen:phrase no}</xen:option> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_recent_status_show_duplicates_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_recent_status_show_update_form}:" name="{$namePrefix}show_update_form"> <xen:option value="1" selected="{$options.show_update_form}">{xen:phrase yes}</xen:option> <xen:option value="0" selected="!{$options.show_update_form}">{xen:phrase no}</xen:option> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_recent_status_show_update_form_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:radiounit>

<xen:require css="widget_framework.css" />
<xen:radiounit name="_" label="" value="{xen:if '{$text} === null', 'template', 'text'}"> <xen:option value="template" label="{xen:phrase wf_use_an_existing_template}:"> <xen:disabled> <xen:textbox name="{$namePrefix}template" value="{xen:if '{$text} === null', $options.template}" inputclass="AutoComplete AcSingle" data-acurl="{xen:adminlink 'template-modifications/auto-complete'}" /> </xen:disabled> </xen:option>
<xen:option value="text" label="{xen:phrase wf_or_enter_it_here}..."> <xen:disabled> <xen:textbox name="{$namePrefix}text" value="{$text}" rows="3" inputclass="Elastic" /> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:controlunit label="{xen:phrase wf_template_controller}:"> <xen:html> <xen:textbox name="{$namePrefix}controller_name" value="{$options.controller_name}" size="20" placeholder="{xen:phrase controller_name}" /> :: <xen:textbox name="{$namePrefix}controller_action" value="{$options.controller_action}" size="20" placeholder="{xen:phrase controller_action}" /> </xen:html> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_template_controller_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:controlunit>

{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_threads}"} {xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_type_new} {xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_type_recent} {xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_type_recent_first_poster} {xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_type_latest_replies} {xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_type_popular} {xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_type_most_replied} {xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_type_most_liked} {xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_type_polls} {xen:phrase wf_widget_threads_popular_cutoff_explain} {xen:phrase wf_threads_forums_explain} {xen:phrase wf_special_forums_explain} {xen:phrase yes} {xen:phrase no} {xen:phrase wf_threads_prefixes_explain}

<xen:radiounit label="{xen:raw $label}:" name="{$namePrefix}layout_options[{$layout}][{$layoutOptionsKey}]" value="{xen:if 'isset({$options.layout_options.{$layoutOptionsKey}})', {$options.layout_options.{$layoutOptionsKey}}, ''}"> <xen:option value=""> {xen:phrase default} ({$defaultStyle.title}: {xen:if {$defaultStyleProperties.{$layoutOptionsKey}}, {xen:phrase yes}, {xen:phrase no}}) </xen:option> <xen:option value="1">{xen:phrase yes}</xen:option> <xen:option value="0">{xen:phrase no}</xen:option> </xen:radiounit>

<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:raw $label}:" name="{$namePrefix}layout_options[{$layout}][{$layoutOptionsKey}]" value="{$options.layout_options.{$layoutOptionsKey}}" placeholder="{$defaultStyle.title}: '{$defaultStyleProperties.{$layoutOptionsKey}}'" />

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 12}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_users_lowercase}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase wf_order_factor}:" name="{$namePrefix}order" value="{$options.order}"> <xen:option value="register_date">{xen:phrase wf_register_date}</xen:option> <xen:option value="message_count">{xen:phrase wf_message_count}</xen:option> <xen:option value="WidgetFramework_resource_count" displayif="{$_xfrmFound}">{xen:phrase wf_resource_count}</xen:option> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase wf_order_direction}:" name="{$namePrefix}direction" value="{$options.direction}"> <xen:option value="DESC">{xen:phrase wf_descending}</xen:option> <xen:option value="ASC">{xen:phrase wf_ascending}</xen:option> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_display_mode}:" name="{$namePrefix}displayMode" value="{xen:if '{$options.displayMode}', $options.displayMode, 'avatarOnlyBigger'}"> <xen:option value="list">{xen:phrase wf_widget_users_display_mode_list}</xen:option> <xen:option value="avatarOnly">{xen:phrase wf_widget_users_display_mode_avatar_only}</xen:option> <xen:option value="avatarOnlyBigger">{xen:phrase wf_widget_users_display_mode_avatar_only_bigger}</xen:option> </xen:radiounit>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 0}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_users_lowercase}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_display_mode}:" name="{$namePrefix}displayMode" value="{xen:if '{$options.displayMode}', $options.displayMode, 'avatarOnlyBigger'}"> <xen:option value="list">{xen:phrase wf_widget_users_display_mode_list}</xen:option> <xen:option value="avatarOnly">{xen:phrase wf_widget_users_display_mode_avatar_only}</xen:option> <xen:option value="avatarOnlyBigger">{xen:phrase wf_widget_users_display_mode_avatar_only_bigger}</xen:option> </xen:radiounit>

<xen:radiounit label="" name="{$namePrefix}type" value="{$options.type}"> <xen:option value="following">{xen:phrase following}</xen:option> <xen:option value="followers">{xen:phrase followers}</xen:option> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 6}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_users_lowercase}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}avatar" selected="{$options.avatar}"> {xen:phrase avatar} </xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_albums_lowercase}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_comments_lowercase}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_users_lowercase}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_media_lowercase}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase wf_widget_xfmg_media_order}:" name="{$namePrefix}order" value="{$options.order}"> <xen:option value="new">{xen:phrase xengallery_new_media}</xen:option> <xen:option value="rand">{xen:phrase xengallery_random_media}</xen:option> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase wf_categories}:" name="{$namePrefix}categoryIds" multiple="true"> <xen:options source="$categories" /> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}albums" value="1" selected="{$options.albums}"> {xen:phrase wf_widget_xfmg_media_from_albums} </xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_resources}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase wf_widget_xfrm_resources_type}:" name="{$namePrefix}type" value="{$options.type}"> <xen:option value="new">{xen:phrase wf_widget_xfrm_resources_type_new}</xen:option> <xen:option value="latest_update">{xen:phrase wf_widget_xfrm_resources_type_latest_update}</xen:option> <xen:option value="highest_rating">{xen:phrase wf_widget_xfrm_resources_type_highest_rating}</xen:option> <xen:option value="most_downloaded">{xen:phrase wf_widget_xfrm_resources_type_most_downloaded}</xen:option> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase wf_categories}:" name="{$namePrefix}categories" value="" size="5" multiple="true" inputclass="textCtrl"> <xen:options source="$categories" /> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_xfrm_resources_categories_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase wf_use_wrapper}:" name="{$namePrefix}use_wrapper" value="{xen:if 'isset({$options.use_wrapper})', {$options.use_wrapper}, 1}"> <xen:option value="1">{xen:phrase yes}</xen:option> <xen:option value="0">{xen:phrase no}</xen:option> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_custom_template}:" name="{$namePrefix}custom_template" value="{$options.custom_template}" />

code_events.event:
Called when instantiating a widget renderer. This event can be used to extend the class that will be instantiated dynamically.

Callback signature:

$class, array &$extend

Arguments:

  1. string $class - the name of the class to be created
  2. array &$extend - a modifiable list of classes that wish to extend the class. See below.

To use this event properly, determine if the class is one you want to extend. If so, add a new entry to $extend with the name of the class that should extend it. This class MUST be defined as follows:

class My_Class_Name extends XFCP_My_Class_Name
{
	// functionality to extend/override
}

This class must extend the non-existent XFCP_x class. This will be resolved at run time.

Event Hint: Name of the class that is being loaded.

Called after the framework is loaded and ready in both front-end and back-end. You should use this to register your renderers.

Arguments:
  1. array &$renderers - an array of widget renderer class names.

phrases.phrase: Choose where to keep cached widget rendered html. It's not recommended to turn off caching on production site.
You can choose to have a widget page take over the index page. The option "Index Page Route" will be ignored and it is recommended to leave the option "Home Page URL" blank.
Enable this option to turn on layout editor tool for admin.
Enable this property to show links to child nodes for Widget Page navigation tab. Please note that no permission check will be perform.
Enable this property to copy links under "Forums" navigation tab to the one for Widget Page.
Enable this property to render a "Home" navigation tab for the selected Widget Page.
By default, username will be rendered in plaintext. Enable this option to use rich formatting username. This property will be applied to all Users Online Now widgets.
Users Online Now: Show Rich Username
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.

By default, thread information (poster, date, counters) is shown right below title. Enable this option to move it to the bottom of the box. This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.
Enter the number of pages to auto load for infinity scrolling. Special values: -1 = indefinitely, 0 = disabled. This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with full layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
Enter the number of pages which is available to load more via AJAX. Special values: -1 = indefinitely, 0 = disabled. This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with list compact layout.
By default, username will be rendered in plaintext. Enable this option to use rich formatting username. This property will be applied to all Threads widgets.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with sidebar layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with sidebar + snippet layout.
This property will be applied to all Threads widgets with sidebar layout.
Enable this option to hide users who haven't uploaded an avatar.
If specified, users who are member of selected user group will not show up.

This renderer supports caching for improved performance, you can enter the number of seconds for time to live (TTL) value to suit your need. Leave it blank to let the renderer decide the TTL itself. Enter 0 will effectively disable caching.

Enter widget conditionals to control when the widget is shown. The syntax is similar to template conditional for <xen:if /> tag. You can also use Layout Editor to learn which variables are available in which positions. Examples:

{$visitor.user_id} > 0 = logged in users
{xen:helper ismemberof, $visitor, 3} = members of user group #3 (admin group)
{$visitorIsBrowsingWithMobile} = mobile browsers; !{$visitorIsBrowsingWithMobile} = desktop browsers
Deactivate for mobile (deprecated)
Delete all existing widgets before importing
Select this option to make an exact copy of widgets from the XML file. All existing widgets will be deleted completely. This action can not be undone.
The position of this widget relative to other widgets in the same position.
Expression has been deprecated for security reason. Please switch to use Conditional as soon as possible, Expression will be removed completely in the near future.
If provided, the columns won't get smaller than the specified width and will be rendered as rows if user viewport is too small.
Choose a widget page to import widgets into. Otherwise widgets will be imported as global ones.
Include $thread.isNew information if thread is unread (this will disable caching)
Invalid position specified: {position}. The position must be one of three types: "all", "template_name" or "hook:hook_name".
If selected, this page will take over the index page.
Conditional check prevented this widget from being rendered.
Nothing rendered, the widget currently has no contents and users will not see it.
This widget cannot be rendered because the renderer class is invalid.
The maximum number of {items} will be shown.
The specified hook "{hook}" could not be found in any public templates.
Special: Parent Forum (of the current one)
Please confirm that you want to delete the following widget
Please confirm that you want to delete the following widget page
Enter the thread ID of the thread you want to display. Leave it blank to get the latest poll, enter "random" to get a random one each time.
Widget position can not be empty.

There are three types of positions:
- Use "all" position will make the widget show up in the sidebar of all pages.
- Or enter template title of the target page. Popular templates: forum_list (the index page), forum_view (the individual forum page), thread_view (the thread page).
- Or enter hook position in the format of "hook:hook_name" to render the widget directly to the hook. For example: "hook:page_container_content_top" will make the widget visible at the top of the page, on every page.
The provided file is a global widgets file, please unselect the widget page and try again.
The provided file is not an widgets XML file.
The provided file is a page widgets file, please select a widget page to import into.
Enable this option to show statuses from user's friend list only. It will display from all users if current user is not logged in.
Allow Multiple Statuses From Same User
Enable this option to list all statuses by their posting order. If a user posted many statuses continuously, all of them will be shown.
Enable this option to show an update form if the current user has permission to do so.
Choose a renderer for this widget and configure its contents.
The requested thread doesn't have a poll attached.
The requested Widget could not be found.
The requested widget page could not be found.

The "Special" selections are experimental, use with your own risk. Current forum is detected by the parameter "$forum" of the template, it should work as expected in thread_view or forum_view. The behavior is unexpected in other positions.
Status older than this number of days won't make it to the list.
Some template needs its data to render properly. Enter the controller name and action here to obtain the required data.
Select the forums you want to search for threads. Leave nothing selected to include all viewable forums.
Sidebar (avatar, title and one extra line)
Select the prefixes you want to filter the threads with.
Enter the tags you want to filter with. Threads with one of the specified tags will show up unless you check the box above.
The title will display above the widget contents where applicable.
Use guest permissions (instead of current user permissions)
If specified, only user of selected user groups will be show.

Enter the callback to render this widget. Callback signature:
array $widget, $positionCode, array $params, XenForo_Template_Abstract $renderTemplateObject
Title + Snippet of Content + Image (if any)
Widget Group must always be activated.
Threads older than this number of days won't be included in "random" candidate list.
Threads older than this number of days won't make it to the list. Depending on widget configuration, this option may be required for acceptable performance.
Select the categories you want to search for resources. Leave nothing selected to include all viewable categories.
You may not view this page because it is restricted.

templates.template:
<xen:comment>
Please do not edit this template.
All customization should go to wf_default_EXTRA.css
</xen:comment>

.wf-container-simple .mainContainer_noSidebar, <xen:comment>UI.X styles</xen:comment>
.wf-container-simple #content,
.wf-container-simple #content > .pageWidth,
.wf-container-simple #content > .pageWidth > .pageContent
{
	background: none !important;
	border: 0 !important;
	margin: 0 !important;
	max-width: initial !important;
	padding: 0 !important;
	width: 100% !important;
}

.wf-no-logo-block #logoBlock { display: none !important; }
	.wf-no-logo-block #headerMover #header {
		padding: 10px 0 !important;
	}

.wf-no-header-proxy #headerProxy { display: none !important; }
	.wf-no-header-proxy #headerMover #header {
		background: none !important;
		position: absolute;
		width: 100%;
		z-index: 1;
	}
	.wf-no-header-proxy .tabLinks { display: none !important; }
	.wf-no-header-proxy #navigation .pageContent { height: auto !important; }
	.wf-no-header-proxy .navTabs
	{
		background: none !important;
		border: none !important;
		border-radius: 0 !important;
		margin: 0 !important;
		padding: 0 !important;
	}
	.wf-no-header-proxy .navTabs .navTab
	{
		background: none !important;
		border: none !important;
		border-radius: 0 !important;
	}
	.wf-no-header-proxy .navTabs .navLink { color: {xen:property contentBackground} !important; }

.widget-container.sidebar.act-as-sidebar
{
	{xen:property wf_contentWidgetContainer}
}

.sidebar-widget
{
	{xen:property wf_sidebarWidget}
}

.hook-widget
{
	{xen:property wf_hookWidget}
}

.widget-rows > div
{
	margin-top: 5px;
}

.widget-tabs
{
	{xen:property wf_widgetTabs}
}
	.widget-tabs .tabs
	{
		{xen:property wf_widgetTabsTabs}
	}

	.widget-tabs .tabs > li
	{
		display: inline;
		float: none;
	}

	.widget-tabs .widget-panes
	{
		{xen:property wf_widgetTabsPanes}
	}

.widget-columns
{
}
.columns-table
{
	display: table;
	table-layout: fixed;
	width: 100% !important;
}
.columns-row
{
	display: table-row;
}
.widget-column
{
	display: table-cell;
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property wf_groupBorder}">
.widget-columns > .columns-container > .widget-column > div
{
	margin-left: 5px;
}
.widget-columns > .columns-container > .widget-column.column-1 > div
{
	margin-left: 0;
}
.widget-columns > .columns-container > .widget-column
{
	border-left: 1px solid {xen:property primaryLighter};
	margin-left: -1px !important;
}
.widget-columns > .columns-container > .widget-column.column-1
{
	border-left: 0;
	margin-left: 0 !important;
}

.widget-rows > div
{
	border-top: 1px solid {xen:property primaryLighter};
	margin-top: 5px;
	padding-top: 5px;
}
.widget-rows > div.row-1
{
	border-top: 0;
	margin-top: 0;
	padding-top: 0;
}
</xen:if>

.hook-widget > h3
{
	color: {xen:property primaryMedium};
	font-size: 1.1em;
	font-weight: bold;
}

.widget .avatarHeap
{
	margin-right: -10px;
}

<xen:include template="wf_profile_posts.css" />
<xen:include template="wf_threads.css" />
<xen:include template="wf_others.css" />
<xen:include template="wf_default_EXTRA.css" />
